name: The Maze - Demo
description:
** WEB CONTROLS (Console Controls in brackets)** Arrow Keys: Movement Z (A Button) : Interact      X (B button) : Use Tool Shift (Select) : Open 'Tool Menu' If the first menu doesn't seem to work, make sure you've clicked in the game box with the mouse, as this will allow the arrow keys to work properly. Each maze has a single exit... but where will it lead; Will it bring you closer to your goal of collecting all six fragments of the ancient scroll that you've been searching for? Welcome to the demo of The Maze- a maze-based exploration game for the original GameBoy. With over a dozen large levels to explore, you are tasked with collecting 6 pieces of an ancient scroll in order to successfully complete the demo. Just remember, it's not safe to stay in one maze for too long... All feedback is welcome, and very much appreciated!

This game is meant to be played on the original GameBoy (GameBoy DMG) or suitable emulator, however, there is also a web playable version on this page.
